_comment_global: Global game configuration file. Comments using _comment are stripped before use.
_comment_viewport: Viewport sizes affect what is visible to the player, not the actual dungeon size.

map_config._comment: All procedural generation parameters for mapgen.
map_config._comment_tileset: Tile symbols used in mapgen and rendering.
map_config._comment_seed: Set to a number for deterministic generation; use null for random.
